Text: psst, the last version is 5.4.6...The version 5.4.6.1 doesn't exist (yet, to keep LimeWire's wallet filled and us busy!)
What I don't like about Limewire is the way it chews up my hard drive directories. Nasty. But it's still good for sharing smaller files.

be carefull using limewire or other sharing apps

very interesting comment written by HEISE-online, read it before sharing any files
